values: 秋千，荡秋千；摆动，摇荡；剧变，大变
To swing something means to move it back and forth or from side to side.
He can swing a golf club very powerfully.
秋千

摆动， 摇摆； 秋千
To swing is to move back and forth or from side to side on a fixed point or to hit something with a swinging motion.
Swing means to move back and forth or from side to side in a rhythmic motion.
